fetchPlaylist.title: Fetching your music
fetchPlaylist.content: Currently fetching your libraries and playlists, please wait.

fetchStats.title: Crushing data
fetchStats.content: Hold on, you're data are on the road.

wish.title: Make a suggestion
wish.content: If you noticed that a track you like is missing from any playlist here, you can make a suggestion. Paste a URL or write as much information as you can about it, and an administrator will process your request. You will be notified when the track you requested has been added to a playlist. Also, if you have any feature idea, feel free to fill this field (hard to say isn't it?).

newLibrary.title: New library
newLibrary.content: Welcome! Fill the path with your library's one, name it and let the magic begin! Some additionnal features are waiting for you if your library is synced with other devices, using SyncThing.

placeholder.name: Enter the name of the library
placeholder.path: Enter the absolute path to your library

newPlaylist.title: New playlist
newPlaylist.content: Please choose a name for your brand new playlist.
newPlaylist.placeholder: Enter the name of the playlist

scan.title: Library scan in progress...
scan.content: Dark magic is currently happening, but doing such activity may take a while, depending on the number of files you have. Please relax, go grab some coffee and let the server manage its business.
scan.footer: On average, it take a minute to process two thousand files. Just do the math ;)

renamePlaylist.title: Rename

content.pt1: You are about to rename your playlist named <b>
content.pt2: , Do you really want to rename it ?

renamePlaylist.placeholder: Enter the new name of the playlist

content.pt1: You are about to delete your playlist named
content.pt2: , and all the tracks that you've collected in it. Do you really want to delete this ?

invitation.title: Invitation code
invitation.content: Here is your unique invitation code. Share it with your friends if they want to join ManaZeak. Please do not share this code on the internet.

extractCovers.title: Re-extract all covers from tracks
extractCovers.text:
Covers are automatically extracted from all tracks contained in a new library and locally stored on the server.
This command will erase existing covers and re-extract them for all tracks stored in the database.

removeMoodbars.title: Remove all moodbars from server
removeMoodbars.text:
ManaZeak perform a MoodBar scan on all tracks in the /library/ folder every hour to generate the associated .mood file (if it doesn't exists already).
This command will erase all existing .mood file stored in the server. You might wait an hour or less before ManaZeak re-generate those .mood files.

dropDatabase.title: Drop database
dropDatabase.text:
The server database stores data about users, libraries, playlists, tracks, artists, albums, genres, shuffle history, user history and statistics.
This command will delete everything in the database except users.

sponsoring.title: Sponsoring option on subscribe
sponsoring.text:
When activated, any user that want to sign up needs to provide an ID from a user already signed in ManaZeak.
This command will add a field in the sign up form that is mandatory. Sponsoring current status :

permissions.FTAL: Access to the whole family tree

rescanLibraries.title: Rescan libraries
rescanLibraries.text:
After you made modification on files located in a library folder, use this command to perform a rescan.
This command will rescan all libraries in the database.

removeLibraries.title: Remove libraries
removeLibraries.text:
In case of... Warning, this command apply to every user in ManaZeak.
This command will erase all libraries in the database.

apiKey.title: SyncThing API key
apiKey.text:
In order to link ManaZeak with the SyncThing instance in the server, you must provide the SyncThing API key.
Please fill the following field with the key you can find on the SyncThing interface.

bufferPath.title: Buffer path
bufferPath.text:
The buffer folder is the one selected to upload file in.
Please fill the following field with the buffer path.

rescanFolders.title: Rescan SyncThing folders
rescanFolders.text:
A SyncThing folder must be rescanned every time a modification is made on a file inside.
This command will perform a rescan on each SyncThing folder.

removeAccount.title: Remove my account
removeAccount.text:
Warning, this action will remove you from the database with all your data.
Are you sure you want to remove your account ?
